doc.field: VA Geologic Units: Virginia Geology and Faults Maps (USGS)

These datasets were downloaded by the UVA Library's Scholars' Lab from the USGS (http://tin.er.usgs.gov/geology/state/state.php?state=VA), and are provided AS-IS with no guarantees as regards to its accuracy or temporal currency. They pertain primarily to the major geologic units and faults within Virginia. * // * These datasets were initially published in 2005 and were updated in December 2007 and again in august 2008. * // * Datasets/Layers included in this collection [datastack] (with non-exclusive list of included attributes) are: * Geology - incl. map unit symbols (geologic units and abbreviations - see full USGS metadata [linked below] for individual unit names), unit age, and primary and secondary rock types. * Faults. *//* Also included is an additional zipped archive containing ArcGIS .LYR layer files to aid in drawing and displaying the data.
*//* *//* SPECIAL SLAB NOTE: These datasets reside on the NEW SLAB SHARED DRIVE, and have been uploaded into PostGIS. Namespace and Datastore folders have been created in GeoServer and Pointsman, but the individual webservices have NOT yet been created (and therefore the links to the "layers" below will not work!!!).
